entry.title: Markdown 语法备注
entry.content:
备注：具体样式需要修改screen.css

Code blocks are part of the Markdown spec

代码段示例之一：

def yourfunction():</p>

<pre><code>   print "Hello World!"
</code></pre>

<p>

代码段示例1：

def openFile(filepath){
    return File.open(filepath);
}

无序列表

  • Red
    • Red 1
    • Red 2
  • Green
  • Blue

有序列表

  1. Bird
    1. Ordered sub-list
    2. Ordered sub-list
  2. McHale
    1. Ordered sub-list
  3. Parish
    1. Ordered sub-list

这是外部链接：google

这是内部链接：关于

斜体字

强调

行内代码段：There is a literal backtick (`) here. 结束

Use the printf() function.

分行线

表格

Colons can be used to align columns.

Tables Are Cool
col 3 is right-aligned $1600 |
col 2 is centered $12 |
zebra stripes are neat $1 |
